name: The Halls of Mourning
description:
The Halls of Mourning (Domino effect) is a work in progress single-player third person mystery/exploration game with a dark atmosphere and some light puzzles, all loosely inspired by isometric games of a similar concept.

You descended into a vast, dark cavern.  The stories of old warn you about this place. Danger and mystery surround the extensive down reaching paths to the fallen city. Relying on your abilities you must navigate the treacherous path, solve deadly traps and uncover the secret that lies in the Halls of Mourning.

Manipulate your surroundings to solve puzzles and avoid creatures, make progress in your exploration and survive.

The download is a pretty polished demo level of what is to be a longer project. We hope you enjoy the level and any feedback is always appreciated!

The demo version doesn't have a save system, so if you leave the game you must start from the beginning.
